Header: Meditation Trains Attidiya 'Mihindu Seth Medura' Inmates
Content: One more round of meditation, conducted by Ven Diyasenpura Wimala Thero under Lakviru Meditation project trained inmates and staff at Mihindu Seth Medura on Friday (14) at Attidiya. 4 Officers and 48 other rankers in the venue attended for this meditation programme. Directorate of Psychological Operations coordinated this programme.
